title: I'm Convinced My 9th Grade Science Teacher Knew I was Being Abused

author: thecourageofstars
text:
This comment has been removed for invalidation. If OP says they wish there had been intervention, it's not our place to say they were better off with their abusive parents. This has horrible implications, and I shouldn't have to explain why.

As this is your second time breaking our rules, you've received a temporary ban.

author: thecourageofstars
text: This comment has been removed for derailing. Please keep the focus on the situation OP has presented in the post.

author: thecourageofstars
text: Removed. Please only comment if you want to support OP.
